thread.title: BRIEF-Delmar Pharmaceuticals To Increase Number Of Authorized Shares Of Stock, Par Value Of $0.001, Per Share From 50 Mln Shares To 70 Mln Shares

title: BRIEF-Delmar Pharmaceuticals To Increase Number Of Authorized Shares Of Stock, Par Value Of $0.001, Per Share From 50 Mln Shares To 70 Mln Shares
text:
Market News April 13, 2018 / 8:26 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Delmar Pharmaceuticals To Increase Number Of Authorized Shares Of Stock, Par Value Of $0.001, Per Share From 50 Mln Shares To 70 Mln Shares Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
  DelMar Pharmaceuticals Inc: 
* TO INCREASE NUMBER OF AUTHORIZED SHARES OF STOCK, PAR VALUE OF $0.001, PER SHARE FROM 50 MILLION SHARES TO 70 MILLION SHARES Source text: ( bit.ly/2GWHkzx ) Further company coverage:
